title: 3dWinsor
description: Apply a 3D 'Winsorizing' filter to a short-valued dataset.

irad.title: Radius
irad.description: Include all points within 'distance' rr in the operation, where distance is defined as sqrt(i*i+j*j+k*k), and (i,j,k) are voxel index offsets.

cbot.title: Bottom clip index
cbot.description: Set bottom clip index to bb.

ctop.title: Top clip index
ctop.description: Set top clip index to tt.

nrep.title: Repeat filter
nrep.description: Repeat filter nn times. If nn < 0, means to repeat filter until less than abs(n) voxels change.

keepzero.title: Keep zero voxels
keepzero.description: Don't filter voxels that are zero.

clip.title: Clip value
clip.description: Set voxels at or below 'xx' to zero.

prefix.title: Output prefix
prefix.description: Use 'pp' as the prefix for the output dataset.

mask.title: Mask dataset
mask.description: Use 'mmm' as a mask dataset - voxels NOT in the mask won't be filtered.

dataset.title: Input dataset
dataset.description: Input dataset to apply the filter on.
